Reviews.Title: Dont know what the big deal is.....
Reviews.Author: janel
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone about two weeks ago. It said I would receive it with standard shipping in a month. I received it in a week. When I opened it the box said it was an android note II. A Galaxy Note II is somewhere between 300-400 dollars and I refuse to pay that for a phone. This phone was well priced and I have NO problems with it. It works good for straight talk. I also purchased the straight talk sim card so it would work. there were instructions it was very easy to do. Now the transfer process did take about three hours but as soon as they did the transfer this phone was able to call out but I still received calls on the old phone untill the full three hours was up. I have no complaints. I can download from google play, both my cameras work. One of my friends just bought this same phone. So far it was a great deal for people who dont have to have the name.....

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: carol salsbury
Reviews.Content: i gave this a 4 star just because my home button broke, i was going to send it back and get a refund, but i have changed my mind maybe i can buy a new button for it, it works just as a cell phone would, texting ,calling, game play , pictures are great, internet, bluetooth, it does not feel fake at all, slightly heavy,at this moment it works better than my atrix 2 , i would buy from this buyer again no doubt.

Reviews.Title: A Clone of a Clone=)
Reviews.Author: Chris Swiontek
Reviews.Content: first off...this is a android 2.3 os phone {not 4.2.1 or 4.0 anything} ,it runs on a hacked firmware called MocorDroid ,that is used to give FAKE SPECS when you look at the properties of the phone.The  firmware is modified to lie about  its processor ID and available system ram . this  ISNT EVEN A REAL "STAR" cellphone ,its a clone of it made by "CUBIT"  the ACTUAL spec of this phone are as follows:  -Arm Cortex -A5 SINGLE CORE cpu  - 256mb of system ram {not 512mb as seller listed}  - 127mb of internal STORAGE! {not 2gb  as seller listed}  - NO GPS! {the phone DOES NOT even have a GPS chip in it at all }  - THE Camera on back is actually VGA 300K/640X480 interpolated / not 2mp as seller listed {very bad image quality}  - The Front camera is actually 320x240 pixels /  NOT 2MP as seller listed  - Records video at 320x240 pixels at 15 frames per sec /NOT 2MP VIDEO RECORDING as seller listed  - NOT A "Star N9000 I9220 cell phone" / as seller listed ! {it is actually a "Cubit N9770" PHONE!}  - this is a Spreadtrum based phone!  nOW....is it worth $99.98 {what i paid without shipping from this seller}....Maybe? i mean really,what do you expect for less than 100 buks? so in that aspect ,i dont feel so bad buying it, but i was really EXPECTING THE STAR PHONE this seller is actually advertising . {i should have known it was to good to be the real  thing at this price, the real "star I9220 " this seller is FALSELY advertising is about 50 buks more} i Guess this seller didnt think  people would notice or care  because it was so cheap in price, but I NOTICED!Cosmetically , it looks IDENTICAL to the real this, but inside ,its not even close.if u just need a cheap 5" phone to make calls and look fancy ,this would do , But otherwise,save up your money and buy a REAL "Star cell" from a seller who ACTUALLY HAS THE REAL THING.

Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: Myasia Gregg
Reviews.Content: I  HATE this phone it is not a good phone it is a clone of a clone my friend has dual phone that's similar to this one but it works way better and you cant really tell that its a clone so I wouldn't recommend anyone getting this crap and the front and back camera sucks and there is no phone cases to fit this crap

Reviews.Title: gosh
Reviews.Author: traci dargan
Reviews.Content: This phone move slow while on internet and any other things that has to use internet service.  I had to figure out how to get my internet tor eading english. Im thinking about sending it back.

Reviews.Title: Waste of $$$
Reviews.Author: Melinda
Reviews.Content: Won't send or receive most text messages and can't receive most phone calls! Waste of all the money I spent on it!

Reviews.Title: Galaxy S4
Reviews.Author: Desire
Reviews.Content: I thought the phone was just an regular android but it actually was an Galaxy s4 but that's even better!

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone
Reviews.Author: Jessica V.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my husband ..  He likes it.he is not a cell phone savay just needed to be able to see his texts and play games..  so far product came earlier than expected and its nice that it came with 2 batteries and a phone cover.

Reviews.Title: Samart phone like you have ever seen one touch and you,ll tell every one that you no.
Reviews.Author: Woodrow M.
Reviews.Content: If you have a smart phone and can use a new one then don,t delay and shop for your,s today.

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: Chey95
Reviews.Content: slow internet, no gps app, not a lot of storage, and downloading was very slow, doesnt have swipe keyboard, intenet shows up as google but in a different language.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Rachel Bobb
Reviews.Content: The seller boasted features of this phone that are non existent. the phone does i keep getting memory error and downloading apps are a big problem even with a 4GB memory card installed. I've regretted spending my money on it.

Reviews.Title: this phone dosnt work
Reviews.Author: Ebony
Reviews.Content: i bought this phone and it didnt work it wouldnt even cut on i will never buy another phone like this.....

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Phone
Reviews.Author: joyce purnell
Reviews.Content: My daughter is enjoying her phone so much. She can do so many more thing on it than she could on the other one she had.

Reviews.Title: POOR product
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these phone and neither worked. Call had terrible feedback to the point I could not understand the caller. The data never did work.

Reviews.Title: i love this phone
Reviews.Author: Lakeshia Anderson
Reviews.Content: I love this phone ,it took a little longer to get to me but its everything i wanted. And more would purchase it all over again

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone to buy
Reviews.Author: Lakethia Amanda Davis
Reviews.Content: I didn't like it and it didn't do anything I would want a phone to do I will not be buying another unlocked phone.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Product again
Reviews.Author: Franklin Alex
Reviews.Content: I ordered a N9000  and when I looked at the model number it said something else. I got my refund and about to return the package. Amazon should not sensor people on pointing this out and they should stop this from happening. so far I have ordered close to a dozen phones and none were the correct model. The outside of the phones look the same, but the model numbers are different and so some features are not present.

Reviews.Title: its messed up
Reviews.Author: trek
Reviews.Content: i choose this rate because the dont camera dont work. And the phone keep sayin it dont have storage to take pictures and i have a 32gb sd card
